Message: You know what she said to me?

“If it is revenge you seek,
then I will grant you power.”

...Who the hell
do you think you are?

Don’t fret—
I have no need of your power.

My time on the battlefield has
already taken my sanity away.

I collected my comrades’
dog tags and hung them
around my neck.

I will never forget any of you.
We’re bound forever...

I’ll eventually follow
you all to the other side.
So, wait for me just
a little longer.

...Because I’m going to see
to it that those snakes pay
for what they’ve done.

At last, I turned my head
towards the Pope and
told her one last thing.

Be sure not to miss out
on what’s coming next.
You’ll get what you wish for—

No. I’ll show you something
the likes of which you’ve
never seen...

The place I have
in my sights is...
the capital.
